Le Bureau National Erasmus+ Algรฉrie a le plaisir de vous annoncer l'ouverture de l'appel ร projets Erasmus+ 2024, dotรฉ d'un budget total de 4,3 milliards d'euros, dรฉdiรฉ au soutien de la mobilitรฉ et la coopรฉration internationale.
ย
En Algรฉrie, les รฉtablissements d'enseignement supรฉrieur (EES) sont รฉligibles aux actions clรฉs suivantes :
ย
Action Clรฉ 1 : les projets de mobilitรฉs


La mobilitรฉ internationale des รฉtudiants et du personnel (ICM).


Les projets d'รฉchanges virtuels.
ย


Action Clรฉ 2 : les projets de coopรฉration


Les projets de renforcement des capacitรฉs dans les domaines de l'enseignement supรฉrieur(CBHE), et de la formation professionnels (CBVET).


Les mesures de conception Erasmus Mundus.


Les Masters conjoints Erasmus Mundus.
ย


Actions Jean Monnet


Modules ; Chaires ; Centres d'excellence ; Rรฉseaux.










ย








Guide de soumission Erasmus+ pour l'Algรฉrie










































Pour une meilleure comprรฉhension de de l'appel ร propositions Erasmus+ 2024, le Bureau National Erasmus+ Algรฉrie met ร votre disposition unยGuide de soumissionยdestinรฉ aux porteurs de projets algรฉriens.ยNous vous invitons ร le dรฉcouvrir et ร le partager largement!








En savoir plus
























































ย








Liens utiles :


Dates limites de soumissions :ยhttps://erasmusplus.dz/Open-calls


Projets Erasmus+ en Algรฉrie :ยhttps://erasmusplus.dz/projects


Erasmus+ project results :ยhttps://erasmus-plus.ec.europa.eu/projects


Documents ressources :ยhttps://erasmusplus.dz/resources


Email :ยinfo@erasmusplus.dz










ย


























































































www.erasmusplus.dz






















































ย

Description:
We would like to inform you about three new webinars that the European Commission is organising:Title: Lump Sum Funding in Horizon Europe: How does it work? How to write a proposal?Date:ย11ยMayย2023,ยfromย10:00amยtoย12:00amย(CEST,ยBrusselsยtime)Target group: Applicants and beneficiaries who are or will be involved in lump sum grantsEventยwebsite:https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/docs/h2020-funding-guide/other/event230511.htm[2]ย(remoteยonly,ยnoยneedยtoยregister)Title: Info session on Horizon Results Booster โ steering research towards a strong societal impactDate:ย24ยMayย2023,ยfromย10:00amยtoย12:30amย(CEST,ยBrusselsยtime)Eventยwebsite:https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/docs/h2020-funding-guide/other/event230524.htm[3]ย(remoteยonly,ยnoยneedยtoยregister)Title:ยCoordinatorsโยDayยonยHorizonยEuropeยGrantยManagementDate:ย08ยJuneย2023,ยfromย09:30amยtoย13:00amย(CEST,ยBrusselsยtime)Eventยwebsite:https://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/docs/h2020-funding-guide/other/event230608.htm[4]ย(remoteยonly,ยnoยneedยtoยregister)
Theseยwebinarsยareยdesignedยforยproposal/grantยcoordinators,participantsยandยotherยstakeholders.Weยwouldยappreciateยyouยcouldยpleaseยforwardยthisยinvitationยtoยtherelevantยpeopleยinsideยyourยorganisationsยandยnetworks.And, of course, you are most welcome to participate too.

Title: No title
Description: Following our communication earlier in March, we are pleased to inform you that the first Call for Proposals of the Intra-Africa Academic Mobility Scheme 2022-2027 [1]ยfinancedยunderยtheยNeighbourhood,Development and International Cooperation Instrument (NDICI-Global Europe), has now been published on the Funding and Tender Opportunities Portal [2] of the European Commission. As you know, the Intra-Africa Academic Mobility Scheme is the EUโs programme to encourage international learning mobility across the African continent by providing support for consortia of African Higher Education Institutions and scholarship opportunities for African trainees, students, and staff. It is built on the positive experience of the related previous programmes, the Intra-ACP Academic Mobility Scheme (2010-2013) and Intra-Africa Academic Mobility Scheme I-IV (2016-2020).The action is part of the Youth Mobility for Africa flagship in the field of Education and Training under the Global Gateway Africa-Europe Investment Package [3] and it aims to support learning pportunities and exchanges and ultimately to promote Africa as an attractive study destination.The programme is managed by the European, Education, and Culture Executive Agency (EACEA), in cooperation with the Directorate General for International Partnerships (DG INTPA) and in collaboration with the African Union Commission (AUC).Following the publication of the Call for proposals, EACEA is organising an online information session on Friday, 21 April 2023 (9.30 โ 12.30 CET/CEST, Brussels Time). This session will build on the firstpre-informationยsessionย[4] held on 13 March 2023 with the aim of introducing the new scheme. During this session, the speakers will provide an overview of the programme and details on the new Call,including information on the selection process, the eligibility, selection and award criteria. The participants will also receive guidance and advice on how to prepare and submit an application through the Funding and Tender Opportunities Portal.Please note that the registration is compulsory and can be done via the event webpage [5], where additional information and the agenda are also available. The video recording of the session and the PowerPoint presentations will be made available on the same webpage after the event. [4]Links:------[1]https://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/grants/2021-2027/intra-africa-academic-mobility-scheme_en[2]https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/opportunities/topic-details/ndici-2023-mobaf[3]https://commission.europa.eu/strategy-and-policy/priorities-2019-2024/stronger-europe-world/global-gateway/eu-africa-global-gateway-investment-package_en[4]https://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/news-events/events/online-info-session-intra-africa-academic-mobility-scheme-2023-03-13_en[5]https://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/news-events/events/info-day-intra-africa-academic-mobility-scheme-2023-04-21_en[6]ยhttps://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/Links:------[1]ยhttps://www.researchgate.net/profile/Aziz-Maaliou?ev=hdr_xprf&_sg=C1gFl3nVqGYpK_2AM_YsUX7Xq3iPak4FOTlxOMKg4PVM8I7jTpQUfyAB6oAhL7WGo-3oAgDYEEvGEbFY19CitkAd[2]ยhttps://orcid.org/0000-0002-8332-0573[3]ยhttp://ec.europa.eu

Title: No title
Description: La date approche : J-30 avant le salon professionnel BATIMATECNeยmanquezยpasยcetteยopportunitรฉย!Dans seulement 30 jours, la 25รจme รฉdition du salon professionnel BATIMATEC ouvrira ses portes ! C'est le rendez-vous incontournable pour tous les professionnels de l'industrie de la construction qui souhaitent dรฉcouvrir les derniรจres tendances et innovations.Au cours de ces journรฉes, vous aurez l'opportunitรฉ de rencontrer des fournisseurs, des fabricants et des experts du secteur qui pourront rรฉpondre ร vos questions et vous aider ร amรฉliorer vos pratiquesprofessionnelles. Vous pourrez รฉgalement rรฉseauter avec dโautres sociรฉtรฉs et des partenaires potentiels, renforcer vos relations d'affaires et dรฉcouvrir de nouveaux horizons.Alors, ne manquez pas ce salon professionnel du BTPH qui se tiendra du 07 au 11 Mai 2023 au Palais des Expositions Safex, Mohammadia, Alger.Nous vous attendons nombreux pour dรฉcouvrir ensemble les derniรจres tendances du secteur de la construction !

Title: No title
Description:
Prรฉsentation de la 6รจme Journรฉeยdu LRZA

Le Laboratoire de Recherches sur les Zones Arides (LRZA) en collaboration avec la Facultรฉ des Sciences Biologiques (FSB, USTHB, Alger) organise le 25 Mai 2023 son 6รจme Journรฉe Scientifique (6JSLRZA).
Cette manifestation scientifique sera une occasion pour les membres du laboratoire de communiquer et prรฉsenter les rรฉsultats de leurs travaux et de faire connaitre leurs projets de recherches. Ce sera รฉgalement une rencontre fructueuse aux dรฉbats, discussion et รฉchanges.
Cette journรฉe est ouverte ร tous les chercheurs, post-doctorants et doctorantsโฆ.), dont lโactivitรฉ scientifique sโintรฉresse ร lโรฉcophysiologie animale et vรฉgรฉtale, aux biotechnologies et santรฉ et ร la valorisation des ressources naturelles des zones arides.
Cette journรฉe scientifique offrira une opportunitรฉ dโรฉchanges ยentre les chercheurs travaillant sur les zones arides. Elle fera รฉgalement le point sur lโimplication des recherches sur les zones arides dans le dรฉveloppement durable et ยle progrรจs socioรฉconomique.
Cette ยjournรฉe est essentiellement dรฉdiรฉe ร la mรฉmoire de nos regrettรฉes Prs. Bouguedoura-Keddad Nadia et Bouhired Louiza.

Title: No title
Description:
We are pleased to inform you that the first Call for Proposals of theยnewยIntra-AfricaยAcademicยMobilityยSchemeย[1] (2022-2027) financed underยthe Neighbourhood, Development and International Cooperation Instrumentย(NDICI-GlobalยEurope),ยshouldยbeยpublishedยinยtheยcomingยweeks.The Intra-Africa Academic Mobility Scheme is the EUโs programme toยencourage international learning mobility across the African continentยby providing support for consortia of African Higher EducationยInstitutions and scholarship opportunities for African trainees,ยstudents, and staff. It is built on the positive experience of theยrelated previous programmes, the Intra-ACP Academic Mobility Schemeย(2010-2013)ยandยIntra-AfricaยAcademicยMobilityยSchemeยI-IVย(2016-2020).
The action is part of the Youth Mobility for Africa flagship in theยfield of Education and Training under the Global Gateway Africa-EuropeยInvestmentยPackageย[2] and it aims to support learning opportunities andยexchanges and ultimately to promote Africa as an attractive studyยdestination.It is managed by the European, Education, and Culture Executive Agencyย(EACEA), in cooperation with the Directorate General for InternationalยPartnerships (DG INTPA) and in collaboration with the African UnionยCommissionย(AUC).Ahead of the publication of the Call for Proposals, EACEA is organisingยan online information session on 13 March 2023 (14.30 โ 17.30 BrusselsยTime). During this session, the speakers will inform participants on theยProgramme and its policy framework. They will also give advice on how toยget prepared to submit a proposal.ยThe event will be held in English and an interpretation will beยavailable in French. The recording and PowerPoint presentations will beยmadeยavailableยafterยtheยeventยhere.ย[3]The registration is compulsory to follow the session in web-streaming.ยIfยinterested,ยyouยcanยregisterยHEREย[3].Weยhopeยtoยseeยyouยmanyยinยthisยinformationยsession.links:[1]ยhttps://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/grants/2021-2027/intra-africa-academic-mobility-scheme_en[2]ยhttps://commission.europa.eu/strategy-and-policy/priorities-2019-2024/stronger-europe-world/global-gateway/eu-africa-global-gateway-investment-package_en[3]ยhttps://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/news-events/events/online-info-session-intra-africa-academic-mobility-scheme-2023-03-13_en[4]ยhttps://www.eacea.ec.europa.eu/
